mapper.insert: insert into activity (activityId, activityName, activityDesc, beginDateTime, endDateTime, stockCount, takeCount, state, creator, createTime, updateTime) values (#{activityId}, #{activityName}, #{activityDesc}, #{beginDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{stockCount}, #{takeCount}, #{state}, #{creator}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select activityId, activityName, activityDesc, beginDateTime, endDateTime, stockCount, takeCount, state, creator, createTime, updateTime from activity where activityId = #{activityId}
